resources.string: This Activity is associated DataWedge Profile DWXamarinActivity1, you can scan any barcode type that is enabled in Datawedge > DWXamarinActivity1 > Decoders
This Activity is associated DataWedge Profile DWXamarinActivity2, In this profile Code 128 has been disabled in Datawedge > DWXamarinActivity1 > Decoders
This Activity is associated DataWedge Profile DWXamarinActivity3, In this proifle barcode scanning has been disabled
